text: Galeard Lee Wade (January 20, 1929 - January 16, 2022) was an American baseball player. He played center fielder in Major League Baseball who for the Chicago Cubs in the 1955 and 1956 seasons. Wade was born in Taney County, Missouri. Wadeb died on January 16, 2022 in McDowell County, North Carolina just four days before his 93rd birthday.Gale Lee Wade ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Chicago Cubs players Category:Sportspeople from Missouri
title: Gale Wade
